objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Fast Autofocus System
• Full HD 1080p Video Recording
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Fast autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability at 60fps
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and drive modes
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Durable metal top and bottom plates for long-lasting performance

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, grid-aligned layout divided into four quadrants using diagonal and horizontal/vertical orange divider lines. The top-left quadrant introduces the product with a bold brand name (`heading`), striking product name (`product_name`), and the product type (`product_category`). Below is a bold, energetic slogan (`tagline`) styled in orange, enhancing emphasis. The left lower section highlights product features (`features`) using a bullet point layout and includes a promotional offer (`offer`), large bold pricing (`price`), and a vibrant CTA button (`cta_button`) with defined action text (`cta`). The right section showcases a realistic image of the camera product (`product_image`), accompanied by motivational subheadings (`subheading_1`, `subheading_2`) and a supportive description (`description`) to reinforce product accessibility.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #212121 (background)
- Dark Gray: #2C2C2C, #1A1A1A, #151515
- White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray: #E0E0E0
- Orange: #FF3D00
- Accent Orange: #FF9100
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek and professional aesthetic. The primary color is matte black (#1A1A1A), lending it a modern and high-tech look. Metallic silver accents (#C0C0C0) on dials and text create visual contrast, highlighting functional details while maintaining sophistication. Subtle hints of red (#FF3B30) and orange (#FF9500) on the lens markings offer visual interest and draw attention to controls. The lens glass reflects tones of teal green (#66FFCC) and light yellow (#FFFF99), giving a dynamic, techy finish. These colors blend seamlessly yet stand out, making the camera striking and suitable for a tech-oriented ad banner.
